data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Although the responsibilities of flight crew members change at specific times during their careers, they remain highly responsible positions. Both ____ and ____ engineers ____ responsible ____ the ____ of ____ entire ____ crew ____ all ____ on ____ the ____. Their training and experience allow them to use specialized equipment and make effective decisions.
data.partBlankContent: Although the responsibilities of flight crew members change at specific times during their careers, they remain highly responsible positions. Both pil___ and fli___ engineers a__ responsible f__ the saf___ of t__ entire fli___ crew a__ all th___ on bo___ the airp____. Their training and experience allow them to use specialized equipment and make effective decisions.
data.answer: 虽然机组人员的职责在其职业生涯的特定时期会发生变化，但他们仍然是高度负责的职位。飞行员和飞行工程师都要对全体机组人员和飞机上所有人员的安全负责。他们的训练和经验使他们能够使用专门的设备并作出有效的决定。
